parameters.jsCode:
const rows = $input.first().json.queryResults || [];
const items = rows.map(row => ({
  id: row.id,
  memberId: row.member_id,
  membreNom: (row.membre_nom || '') + ' ' + (row.membre_prenom || ''),
  mois: row.mois,
  annee: row.annee,
  salaireBase: row.salaire_base,
  primes: row.primes,
  deductions: row.deductions,
  chargesPatronales: row.charges_patronales,
  chargesSalariales: row.charges_salariales,
  netAPayer: row.net_a_payer,
  netImposable: row.net_imposable,
  statut: row.statut,
  commentaire: row.commentaire,
  createdAt: row.created_at,
  updatedAt: row.updated_at
}));
return [{json: {success: true, data: items}}];
